articles.description: Australian guard Josh Green has been picked by the Mavericks in the first round, while former NBL star LaMelo Ball now works for Michael Jordan after being taken at pick three.
articles.content:
"Being with my family, it's awesome. It's something I dreamed of doing my whole entire life, so for it to really happen is amazing.
"It would've been cool to be in person [at the draft], but for thi… [+3396 chars]

articles.author: Sam Goodwin
articles.title: 'Means the world': Incredible $16m development in Danny Frawley tragedy - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: A $16 million mental health facility at Moorabbin Reserve will be named after Danny Frawley.
articles.content:
Danny Frawley died in a car crash last year after struggling with mental health issues. Image: Instagram
The Federal and Victorian governments have announced a new $16 million mental health facility… [+2952 chars]
